name: PotionBrewEvent.Post
description: PotionBrewEvent.Post is fired when a potion is brewed in the brewing stand. The event is fired during the BrewingStandBlockEntity#doBrew(Level, BlockPos, NonNullList) method invocation. PotionBrewEvent.stacks contains the itemstack array from the TileEntityBrewer holding all items in Brewer. This event is not Cancelable . This event does not have a result. Event.HasResult This event is fired on the MinecraftForge.EVENT_BUS .
